info.title: Amazing Inventory API
info.description: API documentation for Amazing Inventory management system

post.description: Runs migrations for the system database (database_configurations table, etc.). Requires admin authentication. Useful for free-tier deployments without shell access.
Runs migrations for both system and application databases. Requires admin authentication.

get.description: Returns the status of system database tables to verify if migrations have been run. Requires admin authentication.

post.description: Create a new user account and receive an access token
Authenticate user and receive an access token

get.description: Retrieve the currently authenticated user information

post.description: Check if the authenticated user has a specific permission

get.description: Retrieve all permissions for the authenticated user
Retrieve a paginated list of categories with optional filtering and searching

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term for name or description

post.description: Create a new category with the provided information

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific category by ID

put.description: Update an existing category with new information

delete.description: Permanently delete a category from the system

get.description: Retrieve key inventory metrics including stock value, stock count, and alerts

get.summary: Get revenue vs expenses chart data
get.description: Retrieve daily revenue and expenses data for the last 30 days
Retrieve a paginated list of expense categories with optional filtering and searching

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term for name or description

post.description: Create a new expense category with the provided information

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific expense category by ID

put.description: Update an existing expense category with new information

delete.description: Permanently delete an expense category from the system

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of expenses with optional filtering and searching

post.description: Create a new expense with the provided information

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific expense by ID

put.description: Update an existing expense with new information

delete.description: Permanently delete an expense from the system

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of permissions with optional filtering and searching (Admin only)

post.description: Create a new permission with the provided information (Admin only)

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific permission by ID (Admin only)

put.description: Update an existing permission with new information (Admin only)

delete.description: Permanently delete a permission from the system (Admin only)

get.description: Retrieve a simplified list of all permissions for dropdowns (Admin only)
Retrieve a paginated list of products with optional filtering and searching

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term for name or SKU

post.description: Create a new product with the provided information

sku.description: Optional. If not provided, will be auto-generated starting from AG000001

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific product by ID

put.description: Update an existing product with new information

delete.description: Permanently delete a product from the system

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of purchases with optional filtering and searching

post.description: Create a new purchase with items. This will automatically increase stock and create stock movements.

expenses.description: Optional expenses related to this purchase (e.g., transport, handling)

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific purchase by ID

put.description: Update an existing purchase. This will adjust stock movements accordingly.

delete.description: Permanently delete a purchase from the system. This will reverse stock changes.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of roles with optional filtering and searching

post.description: Create a new role with the provided information (Admin only)

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific role by ID

put.description: Update an existing role with new information (Admin only)

delete.description: Permanently delete a role from the system (Admin only)

get.description: Retrieve a simplified list of all roles for dropdowns
Retrieve a paginated list of sales with optional filtering and searching

post.description: Create a new sale with items. This will automatically decrease stock and create stock movements.

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific sale by ID

put.description: Update an existing sale. This will adjust stock movements accordingly.

delete.description: Permanently delete a sale from the system. This will reverse stock changes.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of stock movements with optional filtering and searching

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter by movement type (in or out)

post.description: Create a manual stock adjustment for corrections (missing items, damaged items, lost items, or entry mistakes). Most stock movements are created automatically through purchases and sales.

reason.description: Manual stock movements can only be created for adjustments. Purchases and sales create stock movements automatically.

notes.example: Missing items found during inventory check

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific stock movement by ID

put.description: Update an existing stock movement and adjust product stock accordingly

notes.example: Missing items found during inventory check

delete.description: Permanently delete a stock movement and revert the stock change

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of suppliers with optional filtering and searching

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term for name, contact, email, or address

post.description: Create a new supplier with the provided information

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific supplier by ID

put.description: Update an existing supplier with new information

delete.description: Permanently delete a supplier from the system

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of users with optional filtering and searching

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term for name or email

post.description: Create a new user with the provided information

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific user by ID

put.description: Update an existing user with new information

delete.description: Permanently delete a user from the system

notes.example: Missing items found during inventory check
